q: GM North America President Mark Reuss and Chrysler's Sergio Marchionne all promise not to fall back into the trap of making too many cars and then slapping huge discounts on the vehicles to move metal off dealer lots. This has been the heart of the problem in Detroit, said Sergio Marchionne , who also heads up Fiat, the Italian auto company. Alan Mulally said Ford has learned that it has to "deal with the current reality. You have to match production to real demand

CNN reports, the Live Action videos are reminiscent of those by right-wing videographer James O'Keefe .... James O'Keefe 's videos were found in at least two investigations to be so heavily edited as to be an unreliable record of what happened, showing no evidence of any wrongdoing by ACORN staff members.... The Live Action videos also appear to be heavily edited.[ http://edition.cnn.com/2011/US/02/08/abortion.video.retraining/] Cecile Richards : Rep. 7, 2011 Donald Rumsfeld unapologetic about Iraq President Bush Defense Donald Rumsfeld is conceding "it's possible" that the biggest mistake of the Iraq war came in drawing down troops too quickly. In a war, many things cost lives, Donald Rumsfeld said in an interview with ABC News airing Monday in advance of the release of his memoir on his long career in public service. The Republican-led House has launched an outrageous assault on women's rights and wants to take away the rights of our sisters, daughters and granddaughters to make their own health care decisions," Barbara Boxer Frank Lautenberg said. Once again, we are seeing a male-o-garchy trying to turn the clock back on women's health. I remain committed to ensuring that American women always have the right to choose what's best for their own lives and their own bodies. "Republicans claim that they want to keep government out of people's lives, but they insist on asserting their authority in the lives of women," Barbara Boxer Kirsten Gillibrand said.
